pageContent: Purpose: Our goal was to evaluate the effect of focal vs extended irreversible electroporation on side effects, patient-reported quality of life, and early oncologic control for localized low-intermediate risk prostate cancer patients.

metaData.source:
Treatment of erectile dysfunction with sildenafil citrate (Viagra) after radiation therapy for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10443730/
